BadgeDetail.Name: Knife Skills
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner is aware of the different knives used and their purpose. They know how to slice, chop, back-slice and rock-shop. They are also able to sharpen and care for knives properly.

Task.Title: Knife Sharpening
Task.Body: Upload a 10 second video demonstrating your knife sharpening skills.For some top tips, checkout this link.
